body_content.explanation: a word, phrase, or sentence that is used as the second part of a book title and is printed under the main title at the front of the book:
examples: The subtitle of this biography is "The Making of an American".

body_content.explanation: words shown at the bottom of a film or television picture to show what is being said, or to translate it into a different language:
examples: The Chinese movie was shown with English subtitles.

body_content.explanation: to add words to the bottom of a film or television picture to show what is being said or to translate it into a different language:
examples: Part of the video had been subtitled.

body_content.explanation: to use a particular word, phrase, or sentence as the second part of a book title and print it under the main title at the front of a book:
examples: Anyone who subtitles their autobiography "my story so far" is telling me that they haven't done much yet.
